alert.note: Alert for Plymouth; Sioux (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 18 at 5:55PM CDT until August 18 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Sioux County in northwestern Iowa... Northeastern Plymouth County in northwestern Iowa... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 555 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Craig, or 8 miles northwest of Le Mars, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Merrill around 600 PM CDT. Struble around 610 PM CDT. Maurice around 615 PM CDT. Le Mars around 620 PM CDT. Remsen around 630 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Brunsville and Oyens. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
